d2e3.d: Easily make an element as wide (relative to its parent) with using the outputclass="w-*" utilities.

d2e10.d: Additional grayscale and hover effects for figures and images

d2e17.d: The Bootstrap extension supports the toTop button, a navigation aide that scrolls up the page.

d2e24.d: You can create counters with outputclass="counter" and otherprops

d2e31.d: Use <bodydiv outputclass="slider"> to hold cards and create a Slider component.

d2e39.d: Extend Bootstrap’s grid system to cover larger gutters, rotations and more.

d2e46.d: Use <ol outputclass="whitebox"> to hold images and create a Whitebox gallery component.

d2e53.d: The classes are named using the format {property}{sides}-{breakpoint}-{size} .

d2e60.d: Use border utilities to quickly style the border and border-radius of an element and convey meaning through color and background-color with a handful of color utility classes.

d2e67.d: With .parallax class and data-img-src parameter you can create simple parallax backgrounds. The data-speed parameter is a number between 0 and 1 that sets the background speed..

d2e74.d: Use outputclass="divider" for simple and animated underlines for titles.

d2e82.d: Incorporate the Bootstrap Extension as a separate plugin to add everything that may be useful but missing from Bootstrap 5.x.

d2e89.d: Additional options for the slideshow component for cycling through elements—images or slides of text—like a carousel.

d2e96.d: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap typography, including global settings, headings, body text, lists, and more.
